head.title: A Sale on Woven Cotton Rugs In Classic American Patterns

hedline.hl1: A Sale on Woven Cotton Rugs In Classic American Patterns

abstract.p: Woodard Weave is offering discontinued patterns of woven cotton rugs for sale at workroom in Queens; photo (S)

block.p: Beginning on Monday, woven cotton rugs by Woodard Weave in discontinued patterns will be on sale at 40 to 75 percent off retail prices. Ends of rolls and one-of-a-kind samples will also be offered. Area rugs -- some of them as large as room-size -- and 27-inch-wide runners will be $4.24 to $8.48 a square foot (reduced from $18.50 a square foot). For an additional $20, the rugs can be finished with fringe; free fringing lessons will be offered as well. On the first three days, a free round-trip bus will leave at 10 a.m. from the northwest corner of 55th Street and 3rd Avenue and return by noon. Through May 10 at the Woodard Weave Workroom, 37-24 24th Street (38th Avenue), Long Island City, Queens, (718) 784-5307.
